ValidationRule.description: Online Account name cannot be changed by any user.Also Rep and Manager cannot change it for 3PL and NS Field Locations.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(OR( $Profile.Name ='OSS Manager', $Profile.Name ='OSS Rep', $Profile.Name ='Automotive Manager', $Profile.Name ='Automotive Leadership', $Profile.Name ='EP Manager', $Profile.Name ='EP Leadership', $Profile.Name ='UTS Manager', $Profile.Name ='UTS Leadership', $Profile.Name ='NS Industrial Development Manager', $Profile.Name ='NS Sales Manager', $Profile.Name ='Intermodal Manager', $Profile.Name ='Intermodal User', $Profile.Name ='OSS Manager Sales and Service' ), OR(AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_OnlineCustomerService', ISCHANGED( Name ) ) , AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_OnlineCustomerCorporate', ISCHANGED( Name ) ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_OnlineCustomerBusiness', ISCHANGED( Name ) ) , AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_FieldLocation', ISCHANGED( Name )), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_3PL', ISCHANGED( Name )), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_Drayage', ISCHANGED( Name ) )), IF( $Profile.Name ='OSS Support', OR(AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_OnlineCustomerService', ISCHANGED( Name ) ) , AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_OnlineCustomerCorporate', ISCHANGED( Name ) ), AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ='NS_OnlineCustomerBusiness', ISCHANGED( Name ) ) ), IF( OR($Profile.Name ='NS Marketing Leadership',$Profile.Name ='NS Marketing Manager'), ISCHANGED( Name ), false) ) )
